default-stack.help: Default stack to be used, valid values: LWIP, NANOSTACK.

default-wifi-password.help: Password for the default Wi-Fi network.

default-wifi-security.help: Wi-Fi security protocol, valid values are WEP, WPA, WPA2, WPA/WPA2.

default-cellular-plmn.help: Default Public Land Mobile Network for cellular connection.

default-cellular-sim-pin.help: PIN for the default SIM card.

default-cellular-username.help: Username for the default cellular network.

default-cellular-password.help: Password for the default cellular network.

dns-response-wait-time.help: How long the DNS translator waits for a reply from a server in milliseconds

dns-total-attempts.help: Number of total DNS query attempts that the DNS translator makes

dns-retries.help: Number of DNS query retries that the DNS translator makes per server, before moving on to the next server. Total retries/attempts is always limited by dns-total-attempts.

dns-cache-size.help: Number of cached host name resolutions

dns-addresses-limit.help: Max number IP addresses returned by  multiple DNS query

socket-stats-max-count.help: Maximum number of socket statistics cached

offload-tlssocket.help: Use external TLSSocket implementation. Used network stack must support external TLSSocket setsockopt values (see nsapi_types.h)
